Josh
Native console access wrapper for Java

com.yifanlu.Josh
Class ConsoleBuffer

java.lang.Object
  com.yifanlu.Josh.JoshBuffer
      com.yifanlu.Josh.Josh
          com.yifanlu.Josh.ConsoleBuffer

public class ConsoleBuffer
extends Josh

Represents a new screen buffer. In a single console application, you can have as many buffers as the memory can handle the limitation of the Windows Console is that only one buffer can be shown at a time, therefore when you need to call Josh.setConsoleActiveScreenBuffer(ConsoleBuffer) method to switch to a new screen buffer.
The standard/default buffer (the one you see when the console first opens) is represented by the static class Josh.

Since:
0.1
Version:
1.0, 04/24/10
Author:
Yifan Lu
